artist: Larsen Design Studio N/E Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: plain weave or variation thereof, using a blue and purple warp #14.  See individual pcs for indv info Royal blue & purple warp.  Lt. blue, tan & olive wool weft.  Plain weave variation. top 7.5" are blue & olive weft, followed by 1" of lt. blue & tan weft.  Left selvedge. (royal blue, purple, lt. blue, tan, olive)
title: Stoneweave on Malachite Blue-Samples
